text: لعنه الله وقال لاتخذن من عبادك نصيبا مفروضا

translations.translation: whom Allah has cursed. He said, 'I will take a certain fixed proportion of Your slaves.
Who was condemned by God and who said: "I shall take from Thy creatures my determinate share,
upon whom Allah has laid His curse. He said (to Allah): 'I will take to myself an appointed portion of Your servants
God condemned Satan when he said, "I will certainly take my revenge from Your servants.
The one whom Allah has cursed; and the devil said, “I swear, I will certainly take an appointed portion of Your bondmen,” –
Allah cursed him. And he [Shaytan] said: "I will take an appointed portion of your servants."
Allah has cursed him; and he said: Most certainly I will take of Thy servants an appointed portion:
He said, 'Assuredly I will take unto myself a portion appointed of Thy servants,
Whom Allah cursed, and he said: Surely I will take of Thy bondmen an appointed portion,
whom God has rejected. He said [to God], "I will assuredly take a number of Your servants,
Allah hath accursed him. And he said: surely shall take of Thine bondmen a portion allotted.
whom Allah has cursed, and who said, ‘I will surely take of Your servants a settled share,
Allah did curse him, but he said: "I will take of Thy servants a portion Marked off;
Allah cursed him. And he [Shaitan (Satan)] said: "I will take an appointed portion of your slaves;
whom Allah has cursed and he (satan) said: 'Indeed, I will take to myself an appointed portion of Your worshipers,
God has cursed him. And he said, “I will take to myself my due share of Your servants.”
Whom Allah has cursed. For he had said, "I will surely take from among Your servants a specific portion.

[4:118] God has cursed him, He has removed him from His mercy. And he, namely, Satan, said, ‘Assuredly I will take to myself, I will appoint for myself, an appointed portion, an apportioned share, of Your servants, [whom] I shall call to obey me.

(Whom Allah cursed) Allah has banished him from all good, (and he) Satan (said: Surely I will take) I will overcome and make slip (of Thy bondmen an appointed portion) an appointed share, and that which I imprint in him shall be his obligation and command; it is also said that this means: out of every thousand people, 999 are destined for the Fire.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
وكيف يعبدونه ويدعون له وقد { لَّعَنَهُ ٱللَّهُ } وطردهه عن عز حضوره
 وأخرجه من خلص عباده بواسطة تغرير العباد وإغراضهم إلى الشرك والطغيان { وَ } بعدمى آيس عن روح الله
 وقنط من رحمته { قَالَ لأَتَّخِذَنَّ مِنْ عِبَادِكَ } الذين طردتني بسببهم وأبعدتني لأجلهم { نَصِيباً } حظّاً كاملاً مما جعلته { مَّفْرُوضاً } [النساء: 118] لهم من توحيدك وتقديسك
 بأن يغرهم ويلبس عليهم إلى أن يشركوا بك
 وينسبوا إليك ما لا يليق بجنابك فينحطوا بها عن كتف حفظك وجوارك
 ويستحقوا سخطك وغضبك

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
ثم وصفه بأوصاف تُوجب التنفير عنه فقال: { لعنه الله } أي: أبعده من رحمته { وقال لأتخذنّ من عبادك نصيبًا مفروضًا } أي: مقطوعًا فرضته لنفسي
 من قولهم: فرض له في العطاء
 أي: قطع
